entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saturna Island 9:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
